actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to treat as a zone business an otherwise qualified business dissected by a census tract boundary line of a designated empowerment zone or enterprise community.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to treat as an enterprise zone business any trade or business which would qualify as an enterprise zone business if the location of such trade or business was not dissected by an empowerment zone boundary.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to treat as a zone business an otherwise qualified business dissected by a census tract boundary line of a designated empowerment zone or enterprise community.
